mapper.sql: goodsProperty.id as id , goodsProperty.property_name as propertyName , goodsProperty.property_type as propertyType , goodsProperty.category_id as categoryId , goodsProperty.category_type as categoryType , goodsProperty.order_number as orderNumber , goodsProperty.status as status , goodsProperty.is_delete as isDelete , goodsProperty.directly_org_id as directlyOrgId , goodsProperty.hierarchy_id as hierarchyId , goodsProperty.creator_id as creatorId , goodsProperty.creator as creator , goodsProperty.create_time as createTime , goodsProperty.updator_id as updatorId , goodsProperty.updator as updator , goodsProperty.update_time as updateTime , goodsProperty.remark1 as remark1 , goodsProperty.remark2 as remark2
mapper.insert:
insert into goods_property_tb
id,
property_name,
property_type,
category_id,
category_type,
order_number,
status,
is_delete,
directly_org_id,
hierarchy_id,
creator_id,
creator,
create_time,
updator_id,
updator,
update_time,
remark1,
remark2,
#{id},
#{propertyName},
#{propertyType},

#{categoryType},

mapper.update:
update goods_property_tb
property_name = #{propertyName},
property_type = #{propertyType},
category_id = #{categoryId},
category_type = #{categoryType},
order_number = #{orderNumber},
status = #{status},
is_delete = #{isDelete},
directly_org_id = #{directlyOrgId},
hierarchy_id = #{hierarchyId},
creator_id = #{creatorId},
creator = #{creator},
create_time = #{createTime},
updator_id = #{updatorId},
updator = #{updator},
update_time = #{updateTime},
remark1 = #{remark1},
remark2 = #{remark2},
where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT goodsProperty.id, goodsProperty.category_id categoryId, goodsProperty.property_name propertyName, goodsCategory.category_name categoryName, goodsProperty.category_type categoryType, goodsProperty.property_type propertyType, goodsProperty. STATUS STATUS, goodsProperty.update_time updateTime FROM goods_property_tb goodsProperty LEFT JOIN goods_category_tb goodsCategory ON goodsProperty.category_id = goodsCategory.id WHERE 1 = 1
SELECT COUNT(goodsProperty.id) FROM goods_property_tb goodsProperty LEFT JOIN goods_category_tb goodsCategory ON goodsProperty.category_id = goodsCategory.id WHERE 1 = 1
